comment: AMAZING! Take her!! Helps you understand real world application beyond a textbook. She is incredibly understanding and works with you. Even helped me outside of class with issues with another professor. She cares about her students and the future of Education in general. Honestly best professor I had at KSU so far.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: AMAZING! she is the definition of what a great teacher/professor is. She gives great lectures and helps you understand the difficulties and amazing things of being a teacher. She taught me a lot of things that I did not know. Overall amazing take her! Our final was 5 questions that we went over prior to taking the class! So easy

Professor Menna is the best. Her assignments are easy and the class is fun. I looked forward to learning from her because she was such a down to earth person. Only issue was the grading system. I had trouble at times knowing my grade but you can just email her and she'll help you out.

SUCH an amazing professor! She was so accessible and tried to help us in any way possible through this crazy semester. Every class was so fun and she really helped to prepare us for the education field. I LOVE THIS LADY, take her if you can!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Menna is one of the best professors I've ever had. She is hardcore, but she is so caring and truly wants to see her students succeed. She has a lot of experience in her profession, and she keeps it real! She has about one assignment a week, but she is very clear on what should be done and grades pretty easy.

i ABSOLUTELY LOVED PROF MENNA! despite covid, she really tried to help us and tried not giving us too much work. her class is always interesting and her stories are the best! you can easily do the bare minimum and pass but she's too nice for that. i learned a lot from her and i would definetely take her again!!

This is my favorite college professor I've ever had! She was actually really cares about all of us and taught me more than a textbook ever could. She made me realize that I really want to be an educator. Most of the grades come from presenting and 'teaching' the class topics. I wish that I could take her for the rest of my education classes.

This is my favorite college professor I've ever had! She was actually really cares about all of us and taught me more than a textbook ever could. She made me realize that I really want to be an educator. Most of the grades come from presenting and 'teaching' the class topics. She is amazing and nothing short of it.

Professor Menna is probably one of the best professors I have had at KSU. The first day she literally said that she was not going to add any stress to us and everything is going to be done in class so very little to no homework. She has so many stories she tells in class that will just make you die of laughter. TAKE HER IF YOU CAN! SHE'S AMAZING!
Literally amazing. SHE was more help then the actual class. Her knowledge and experience helped me so much. Take her, you wont be dissapointed

The most amazing teacher I have ever had in my entire life. She cares about her students so much and will do anything to help you. The last thing she wants is for you to stress about her class the least bit. She shares many of her experiences which makes it worth coming to class. When she thanks you for coming to class, she really means it. No hw.

The one thing that takes her over the top is that she knows when a chapter of the textbook is boring and she does make it more fun to learn and in a way you can easily remember the content. There is a lot of group work but not that bad if you get along with the people at your table (you always pick the group). She makes this class worthwhile.

She is seriously the best professor I have ever had. I've never written a review before but she is so good at what she does she deserves the best praise! She is full of amazing stories and she is very knowledgeable about everything to do with teaching. I would seriously take her if you can, you won't regret a single minute of it!!

Professor Menna was absolutely amazing! It was her first year as a professor and she did amazing. She was funny and caring. She shared a lot of her experiences with us which really helped us become better future teachers. I hope she teaches the next level so I can have her again! Take her if you can!
